analyzed: de lta bu'i gnas skabs can la gang du rnam par 'gyur ba mig btsum pa shes par 'gyur ba'i 'dul ba'i don du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa la sogs pa bstan pa'i phyir de la skyon chags pa med do //
translated: But there is no fault in that, because for those in such a situation, in order to understand the meaning of the Vinaya where the eyes are closed, the miraculous transformation of the Buddha and so on is taught.

original: mngon par 'dul bar yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: mngon par 'dul bar yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “One should not manifest” is connected to “one should not cultivate yoga.”

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong dag sgo khang du rnal 'byor sgom par byed na de dag skur pa dang / ma dad pa dag 'di skad ces @69a * //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong dag sgo khang du rnal 'byor sgom par byed na de dag skur pa dang / ma dad pa dag 'di skad ces @69a * //
translated: Here, the text says: “Monks, if you cultivate yoga in the gateway, those who are slanderers and have no faith will say:

original: 'phags pa dag ci khyed cag 'du bar nyal ba'i brtul zhugs can yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa dag ci khyed cag 'du bar nyal ba'i brtul zhugs can yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The noble ones are ridiculed, You are ascetics who sleep in assemblies. When the monks report this to the Blessed One, the Blessed One says,

original: sgo khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o //
analyzed: sgo khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o //
translated: You should not practice yoga in the gateway.

original: de rnams khyams su sgom par byed na yang de nyid kyi nyes dmigs su gyur pas /
analyzed: de rnams khyams su sgom par byed na yang de nyid kyi nyes dmigs su gyur pas /
translated: When they practice yoga in the courtyard, the same problem occurs.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One says,

original: dge slong gis khyams su yang bsgom par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong gis khyams su yang bsgom par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: You should not practice yoga in the courtyard. This is included in that statement.

original: gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du kun nas bskor ba'i gtsug lag khang gi rdzing bu la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir 'dir rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du kun nas bskor ba'i gtsug lag khang gi rdzing bu la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir 'dir rigs pa yin no //
translated: It is reasonable here to say in the courtyard of the monastery and so on, because it is similar to the statement in the monastery and so on.

original: sgo bcad na ni khyams la sogs pa dag tu mngon par 'du ba nyid du rgyun chad par 'gyur bas nyes ba med pa de gnyis bstan pa'i don du ste de ltar bstan pa'o //
analyzed: sgo bcad na ni khyams la sogs pa dag tu mngon par 'du ba nyid du rgyun chad par 'gyur bas nyes ba med pa de gnyis bstan pa'i don du ste de ltar bstan pa'o //
translated: Thus, it is taught for the sake of showing those two, and it is taught in that way.

original: de ltar yang sgo khang du mtshan mo srog chags 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang sgo khang du mtshan mo srog chags 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, at night, a creature would emerge in the door-way.

original: mtshan mo sbrul gyis bzung bas shi bar gyur pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan mo sbrul gyis bzung bas shi bar gyur pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: At night, he was seized by a snake and died.

original: rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa dang / gtum po dang gya tshom pa rnams yongs su spang bar rigs so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa dang / gtum po dang gya tshom pa rnams yongs su spang bar rigs so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is proper to completely avoid distraction, cruelty, and recklessness.

original: snga ma la ni shin tu 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir mi bya ba nyid smos te /
analyzed: snga ma la ni shin tu 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir mi bya ba nyid smos te /
translated: In the former, it is said that it is improper because it is very much an occurrence.

original: 'dir ni 'di shin tu ma yin zhes bya ba rigs pa de bas na gsungs pa ni rnam par g-yengs pa zhes smos pas de rnams gnas khang du sgom par byed pa na bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig tu mi gnas
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di shin tu ma yin zhes bya ba rigs pa de bas na gsungs pa ni rnam par g-yengs pa zhes smos pas de rnams gnas khang du sgom par byed pa na bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig tu mi gnas
translated: Here, it is not so, and the reason is stated: “because of distraction.” When they meditate in a dwelling place, sound is a thorn for the absorptions, because the mind does not rest one-pointedly.

original: pas na skabs de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: pas na skabs de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One said in that context:

original: gnas khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas khang du rnal 'byor bsgom par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
translated: “Do not meditate in a dwelling place.” This is what is included.

original: rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Distracting” means

original: gnas khang de 'gyur bas rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas khang de 'gyur bas rnam par g-yeng bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: distracting because of the change in the dwelling place.

original: gtum po zhes bya ba smos pas ni de dag dgon par bsgom par mi bya'o zhes bya bar gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: gtum po zhes bya ba smos pas ni de dag dgon par bsgom par mi bya'o zhes bya bar gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
translated: By mentioning “fierce,” it includes the statement: “Do not meditate in the wilderness.”

original: 'dir seng ge la sogs pa gtum po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir 'di spang par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir seng ge la sogs pa gtum po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir 'di spang par bya'o //
translated: Here, lions and other fierce animals appear, so this should be avoided.

original: gya tshom zhes smos pa ni de dag grong gi nye 'khor du dor te sgom par byed pa na /
analyzed: gya tshom zhes smos pa ni de dag grong gi nye 'khor du dor te sgom par byed pa na /
translated: The term “randomly” indicates that when they are discarded in the vicinity of a village and then meditated upon,

original: ma dad pa'i gya tshom byed pa dag 'di skad du 'phags pa dag ci khyed 'ga' zhig shi ba dang ldan pa yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa nas /
analyzed: ma dad pa'i gya tshom byed pa dag 'di skad du 'phags pa dag ci khyed 'ga' zhig shi ba dang ldan pa yin nam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa nas /
translated: those who are contemptuous and lack faith will say, “Noble ones, are you possessed by some ghost?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sa phyogs @69b der yal bar dor ba rnams dang / ki ta ka dang / ki len dza rnams kyis bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: sa phyogs @69b der yal bar dor ba rnams dang / ki ta ka dang / ki len dza rnams kyis bskor bar bya'o //
translated: “They should be surrounded by kiṭaka and kiṃvaja plants.

original: sa phyogs de ji srid du yal ga rnams kyis bskor bar gyur gyi bar du gya tshom pa ma dad pa dag 'di skad ces 'phags pa dag / ci khyed 'ga' zhig ras bal gyi ldum ra byed dam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de sa phyogs
analyzed: sa phyogs de ji srid du yal ga rnams kyis bskor bar gyur gyi bar du gya tshom pa ma dad pa dag 'di skad ces 'phags pa dag / ci khyed 'ga' zhig ras bal gyi ldum ra byed dam zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de sa phyogs
translated: As long as that place is surrounded by branches, those who are contemptuous and lack faith will say, ‘Noble ones, are you making a cotton field?’

original: der tsher ma dang / chu'i 'obs dag gis bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: der tsher ma dang / chu'i 'obs dag gis bskor bar bya'o //
translated: That place should be surrounded by thorns and moats.

original: sa phyogs tsher ma dag chu'i 'obs kyis bskor bar gyur pa dang / gya tshom pa ma dad pa dag 'di skad ces sa bon gyis bkang ba'i ldum ra yin nam /
analyzed: sa phyogs tsher ma dag chu'i 'obs kyis bskor bar gyur pa dang / gya tshom pa ma dad pa dag 'di skad ces sa bon gyis bkang ba'i ldum ra yin nam /
translated: The site of the hut should be surrounded by a moat and filled with thorns,🔽and the faithless should say, “Is this a garden filled with seeds?

original: 'on te se'u 'bru'i ldum ra yin zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: 'on te se'u 'bru'i ldum ra yin zhes bya ba nas /
translated: Or is it a garden of pomegranates?

original: spong khang brtsig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: spong khang brtsig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Up to, “I will build a hut for the purpose of renunciation.”

original: mdo 'dis ni de dag bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: mdo 'dis ni de dag bsdus pa yin no //
translated: This sūtra summarizes those.

original: de'i phyir spong khang gi skabs yin pas na /
analyzed: de'i phyir spong khang gi skabs yin pas na /
translated: Therefore, since it is the context of the hut,

original: grong dang nye ba la sogs par spong khang brtsig par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: grong dang nye ba la sogs par spong khang brtsig par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: it is said, “Build a hut near a village, etc.”

original: de'i rnam pa ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: What is its form?

original: de'i phyir gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang gdod do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas khang gnyis kyi bar du srang gdod do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “In between two houses, a path is made.”

original: ngos ya gcig tu yang gnas khang brtsig la /
analyzed: ngos ya gcig tu yang gnas khang brtsig la /
translated: A house is built on one side,

original: ngos gzhan la ni gzhan brtsig cing bar du srang gdod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: ngos gzhan la ni gzhan brtsig cing bar du srang gdod par bya ba ste /
translated: and another is built on the other side, and a path is made in between.

original: 'di ni spong khang chung du'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni spong khang chung du'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: This is the form of a small hut.

original: bar du srang gdod do zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: bar du srang gdod do zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The middle is the passageway.

original: ngos ya gcig tu yang gnas khang lnga brtsig la /
analyzed: ngos ya gcig tu yang gnas khang lnga brtsig la /
translated: On one side, build five houses.

original: ngos gzhan lnga brtsig cing bar du srang gdod par bya ba'am /
analyzed: ngos gzhan lnga brtsig cing bar du srang gdod par bya ba'am /
translated: On the other side, build five houses, and make a passageway between them.

original: ngos ya gcig tu yang drug brtsig la /
analyzed: ngos ya gcig tu yang drug brtsig la /
translated: Or, on one side, build six houses.

original: ngos gzhan la yang drug brtsig cing bar du spang gdod par bya ste /
analyzed: ngos gzhan la yang drug brtsig cing bar du spang gdod par bya ste /
translated: On the other side, build six houses, and make a passageway between them.

original: 'di ni spong khang chen po'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni spong khang chen po'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: This is the form of the great passageway.

original: spong khang gnyis po 'di dag ni chung du dang chen po ste /
analyzed: spong khang gnyis po 'di dag ni chung du dang chen po ste /
translated: These two passageways are small and large.

original: chung du ni gnas khang gnyis pa ste bar du srang gdod par bya'o //
analyzed: chung du ni gnas khang gnyis pa ste bar du srang gdod par bya'o //
translated: The small one has two houses, with a passageway between them.

original: 'dir chen po ni gnas khang bcu pa'am /
analyzed: 'dir chen po ni gnas khang bcu pa'am /
translated: Here, the large one has ten houses,

original: gnas khang bcu gnyis pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas khang bcu gnyis pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: or twelve houses.

original: bar ma ni rnam par gzhag pa ste /
analyzed: bar ma ni rnam par gzhag pa ste /
translated: The medium one is established.

original: 'di mi rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di mi rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not unreasonable,

original: brjod pa la dpe gnyis kyi phyir zhes bya'o //
analyzed: brjod pa la dpe gnyis kyi phyir zhes bya'o //
translated: because it is said that there are two examples for the expression.

original: sgo glegs sgra mi 'byung ba dang drang ba'i thabs kyang zhes bya ba ni brtsig par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: sgo glegs sgra mi 'byung ba dang drang ba'i thabs kyang zhes bya ba ni brtsig par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: The method of making the door not creak and be easy to open is to apply oil.

original: 'og nas sgo khang bya'o zhes 'byung ba yan chad kun la 'di rjes su sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'og nas sgo khang bya'o zhes 'byung ba yan chad kun la 'di rjes su sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase one should build is applied to everything below, such as one should make a door frame.

original: de'i dang po byas nas brtsig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sgras bshad pa 'di byas pa zhes bya ba de tsam zhig 'dir brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dang po byas nas brtsig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sgras bshad pa 'di byas pa zhes bya ba de tsam zhig 'dir brjod pa'o //
translated: Having made the first, one should build is explained by the word should build. Just that much is stated here.

original: 'dir 'dod pas 'jug pa na /
analyzed: 'dir 'dod pas 'jug pa na /
translated: Here, if one enters with desire,

original: gal te phongs pa ma yin pa'i don la 'jug na gal te ma yin na ji ltar mngon par 'dod pas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te phongs pa ma yin pa'i don la 'jug na gal te ma yin na ji ltar mngon par 'dod pas 'jug par bya'o //
translated: if one does not enter for the sake of the poor, then one should enter as one wishes.

original: @70a * // 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: @70a * // 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: This is what the Blessed One said:

original: sgo gdod par bya'o //
analyzed: sgo gdod par bya'o //
translated: One should make a door.

original: dge slong dag sgo glegs mi 'jud nas /
analyzed: dge slong dag sgo glegs mi 'jud nas /
translated: The monks did not put in door panels,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: and the Blessed One said:

original: sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o //
translated: One should put in door panels.

original: bcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: If it is difficult to close, the Blessed One said:🔽One should put in a bolt.

original: 'phags pa dag lag gzungs gdab par bya'o //🔽sgra 'khrol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa dag lag gzungs gdab par bya'o // sgra 'khrol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Noble ones, you should use a rope to bind the hands.

original: 'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o //🔽dbye dka' na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: 'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o // dbye dka' na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When the sound rang out, the Blessed One said, You should place a piece of leather underneath.

original: 'phags pa dag lag gzungs gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa dag lag gzungs gdab par bya'o //
translated: If it is difficult to open, the Blessed One said, Noble ones, you should use a rope to bind the hands.

original: dbye ba na sgra khrig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dbye ba na sgra khrig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When it is opened, the sound rang out, the Blessed One said, You should wrap it with cloth.

original: ras mas dkri bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa de rnams bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: ras mas dkri bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa de rnams bsdus pa yin no //
translated: This is the summary of what was said.

original: de la sgra mi 'byung ba'i thabs zhes bya ba ni 'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / ras mas dkri bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de rnams bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de la sgra mi 'byung ba'i thabs zhes bya ba ni 'og tu ko ba'i dum bu gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / ras mas dkri bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa de rnams bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Among them, the method of preventing sound is summarized by the statement, You should place a piece of leather underneath and You should wrap it with cloth.

original: drang ba'i thabs zhes bya ba ni phyi nang gnyis nas lag gzungs gdab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: drang ba'i thabs zhes bya ba ni phyi nang gnyis nas lag gzungs gdab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The method of straightening is summarized by the statement, You should use a rope to bind the hands from both the inside and the outside.

original: gong du sum cha bor bar skar khud phyi rub la nang yangs pa yang bzang ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gong du sum cha bor bar skar khud phyi rub la nang yangs pa yang bzang ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: It is also good if the upper part of the window is narrow and the lower part is wide.

original: gong du zhes bya ba ni rtsig ngos kyi gong gi sum cha bor zhing sum gnyis lus pa'i phyogs gang yang rung ba der skar khung btod na bzang ste /
analyzed: gong du zhes bya ba ni rtsig ngos kyi gong gi sum cha bor zhing sum gnyis lus pa'i phyogs gang yang rung ba der skar khung btod na bzang ste /
translated: The upper part is the upper third of the wall. If a window is made in any place where two-thirds remain, it is good.

original: dmas na ni chom rkun pa dang / g-yon can dang seng ge la sogs pas 'dzul ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dmas na ni chom rkun pa dang / g-yon can dang seng ge la sogs pas 'dzul ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is low, thieves, rogues, lions, etc. will enter.

original: mthos na ni snang ba gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthos na ni snang ba gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is high, the light will not be clear.

original: gong du sum cha bor ba la sogs pa'i don du 'di byas so //
analyzed: gong du sum cha bor ba la sogs pa'i don du 'di byas so //
translated: This is done for the purpose of the upper third, etc.

original: de nyid ni 'jig rten pa la grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'jig rten pa la grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is established in the world.

original: dra ba dang / sgo glegs dang / 'phred gtan dang / gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan dang / dbyug gu skam kha nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dra ba dang / sgo glegs dang / 'phred gtan dang / gnam gzer dang / 'khor gtan dang / dbyug gu skam kha nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: One should install a lattice, a door, a crossbar, a bolt, a bolt-receiving post, and a door-handle.

original: 'dis ni khra dang / mchil pa dang / pho rog dag 'jug nas /
analyzed: 'dis ni khra dang / mchil pa dang / pho rog dag 'jug nas /
translated: This prevents crows, owls, and crows from entering.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: skar khud dra ba can du'o //
analyzed: skar khud dra ba can du'o //
translated: In the house with a lattice of windows.

original: sbrang bu tryee ma bug dang / trye la ka dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: sbrang bu tryee ma bug dang / trye la ka dag 'jug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When flies entered through the holes of the three-holed and seven-holed pipes, the Blessed One said,

original: sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: sgo glegs gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Door panels should be installed.

original: rlung gis phye nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rlung gis phye nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When the wind blew them open, the Blessed One said,

original: 'phred gtan gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phred gtan gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Crossbars should be installed.

original: bcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcad dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When it was difficult to close them, the Blessed One said,

original: gnam gzer dang 'khor gtan @70b gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gnam gzer dang 'khor gtan @70b gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Upper beams and lower beams should be installed.

original: dbye dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dbye dka' nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When it was difficult to open them, the Blessed One said,🔽Dryers should be installed.

original: dbyu gu skam kha nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de 'dir bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: dbyu gu skam kha nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de 'dir bsdus pa yin no //
translated: This is the summary of that.

original: dra ba dang zhes bya ba ni bug pa phra mo bstan pa'i don du can gyi sgra sbyar ro //
analyzed: dra ba dang zhes bya ba ni bug pa phra mo bstan pa'i don du can gyi sgra sbyar ro //
translated: With a lattice is stated for the purpose of showing small holes.

original: mi shong na steng du khang mo che bya'o //
analyzed: mi shong na steng du khang mo che bya'o //
translated: If it is not spacious enough, a large upper story should be built.

original: yang na yang thog go zhes bya ba las /
analyzed: yang na yang thog go zhes bya ba las /
translated: Or it should be a multi-storied building.

original: khang mo che zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: khang mo che zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Large upper story means

original: spong khang rnams kyi steng du'o //
analyzed: spong khang rnams kyi steng du'o //
translated: and the meditation huts are on top of those.

original: gal te spong khang la spong khang rnams kyi tshad du mi 'gyur na steng du khang pa mi bya ste /
analyzed: gal te spong khang la spong khang rnams kyi tshad du mi 'gyur na steng du khang pa mi bya ste /
translated: If the meditation huts are not the size of the meditation huts, then the upper story should not be made.

original: khang pa gzhan las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khang pa gzhan las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: “from another building.”

original: gzhung kha cig las de dag der mi shong nas steng du rim khang gnyis pa bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / de gnyis ka yang 'gal ba med pas mdo 'dir bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung kha cig las de dag der mi shong nas steng du rim khang gnyis pa bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / de gnyis ka yang 'gal ba med pas mdo 'dir bsdus pa'o //
translated: Some texts say that if they do not fit there, a second story should be made. Since there is no contradiction between these two, they are included in this sūtra.

original: 'dzeg pa'i phyir them skas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dzeg pa'i phyir them skas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The stairs are for climbing up.

original: bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar te 'dzeg pa'i phyir der them skas bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar te 'dzeg pa'i phyir der them skas bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: “for climbing up, stairs should be made there.”

original: mi ltung bar bya ba'i phyir kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi ltung bar bya ba'i phyir kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o //
translated: The parapet is for not falling off.

original: de mi 'gul bar bya ba'i phyir lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab bo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de mi 'gul bar bya ba'i phyir lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab bo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The iron pegs are for not shaking.

original: de rnams kyis ni kha khyer de dag la 'dzeg dka' nas /
analyzed: de rnams kyis ni kha khyer de dag la 'dzeg dka' nas /
translated: Since it is difficult to climb those parapets,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: the Blessed One said:

original: them skas bya'o //
analyzed: them skas bya'o //
translated: A staircase should be made.

original: ltung bar gyur nas /
analyzed: ltung bar gyur nas /
translated: If it falls down,

original: kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: kha khyer gyis bskor bar bya'o //
translated: a parapet should be built around it.

original: de 'gul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de 'gul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: When it moved, the Blessed One said,

original: lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: lcags kyi gzer bu dag gis gdab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: “It should be fixed with iron pegs.” This is included in that statement.

original: phyi rol du spong khang chen po 'am gnas khang gi tshar dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyi rol du spong khang chen po 'am gnas khang gi tshar dag kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Outside, a large retreat house or a row of living quarters should also be built.

original: bya'o zhes bya ba'i rjes bsnyeg pa'i phyir yang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra smos so //
analyzed: bya'o zhes bya ba'i rjes bsnyeg pa'i phyir yang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra smos so //
translated: The word “also” is stated because it continues the statement “should be built.”

original: 'dir yang ngam zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tshig gnyis ka yang bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir yang ngam zhes bya ba'i sgra ni tshig gnyis ka yang bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the word “or” is used because both statements are inclusive.

original: rab tu byung ba 'di ni phan tshun mi snang ba'i phyir ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba 'di ni phan tshun mi snang ba'i phyir ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, the going forth is not for the purpose of not seeing each other,

original: gnas khang gi tshar dag kyang zhes bya ba de yang /
analyzed: gnas khang gi tshar dag kyang zhes bya ba de yang /
translated: but a row of living quarters should also be built.

original: sngar ltar tshig gnyis ka bsdu ba'i phyir kyang gi sgra smos so //
analyzed: sngar ltar tshig gnyis ka bsdu ba'i phyir kyang gi sgra smos so //
translated: The word “also” is stated because, as before, both statements are inclusive.

analyzed: sgo'i thad kar sgo gdod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba las /
translated: A door should not be made directly in front of the door.

original: 'dis ni de dag nyan du 'gyur ba'i sgo dag gdod cing phan tshun snang nas /
analyzed: 'dis ni de dag nyan du 'gyur ba'i sgo dag gdod cing phan tshun snang nas /
translated: This is the door for their listening.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:🔽“The doors should be made to open to the right, and they should face each other.

original: sgo dag gzur te gdod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: sgo dag gzur te gdod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
translated: ” This is the summary of that.

original: gal te phyi rol gyi char gyis de ma thag pa de smos pa yin no //🔽de ltar yang nang du nyes pa mi @71a * //
analyzed: gal te phyi rol gyi char gyis de ma thag pa de smos pa yin no // de ltar yang nang du nyes pa mi @71a * //
translated: If it is an external rain, that is the one referred to immediately above.

original: 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'grub pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the fault of the interior is not committed.

original: de lta bas na de 'di las tha dad par gyur pa gnyis ka la 'gro ba'i tshig tu gtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na de 'di las tha dad par gyur pa gnyis ka la 'gro ba'i tshig tu gtogs par bya'o //
translated: Thus, that which is different from this should be included in the words “for both.

original: sgo khang bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgo khang bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ” “The door should be made” means

original: spong khang la sgo khang bya'o //
analyzed: spong khang la sgo khang bya'o //
translated: the door should be made in the retreat hut.

original: phug kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phug kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The cave” means

analyzed: spong khang gi nyen 'khor du zhes bya bas de dag 'brel pa'i cho ga rnam par bstan pa'i skabs nas shes par bya'o //
translated: the cave in the vicinity of the retreat hut. The procedure for their connection should be understood from the context of the explanation.

original: 'dug pa'i ched du sa'i stegs bu dag dang khri'u yang bya'o zhes bya ba ni bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ka la sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'dug pa'i ched du sa'i stegs bu dag dang khri'u yang bya'o zhes bya ba ni bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ka la sbyar ro //

analyzed: gru bzhi po'i ngos re re la khru gang pa'i tshad bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

original: thags ma ni rnam pa lnga'o zhes bya ba ni /

original: khri'u'i steng du'o //

original: rung bar grags pa'i phyir /

original: de rnams nyid du grags par shes par bya'o //

translated: Since it is arranged like that, that bed does not harm the edge of the bed, and it is like that. Therefore, the meaning is that it should be made of four cubits in length and two cubits in width, and it should be sewn with two layers.

analyzed: des dbyug gu dal bus btsugs pa des de'i gnyid sad par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bre'i bcad 'phro lta bu zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: dge slong dag gis smyig ma brtsal te des 'dzug pa las rma byung nas /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: The Buddha said,

original: bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur bya'o ;
analyzed: bre'i bcad 'phro lta bur bya'o ;
translated: “The mat should be made like the ellipsis in a verse.”

original: /'on kyang snad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: /'on kyang snad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: ras ma dag gis dkris nas dal bus khad kyis gzugs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ras ma dag gis dkris nas dal bus khad kyis gzugs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “The mat should be wrapped in cloth and rolled up slowly and carefully.”

original: pho lang 'phang bar bya'o //
analyzed: pho lang 'phang bar bya'o //
translated: The dice should be thrown.

original: yang phyir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir tha gus gdags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yang phyir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir tha gus gdags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: And in order to bring them back, they should be tied with a string.

original: pho lang de yang @72a * //
analyzed: pho lang de yang @72a * //
translated: That dice

analyzed: phyir drang bar bya ba'i phyir tha gu phra mo ring mos btags te 'phang bar bya'o //

original: de ltar byas na yang du 'phang zhing blang sla bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas na yang du 'phang zhing blang sla bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is done in this way, it will be thrown far and easy to retrieve.

original: 'dir gzhung ni 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni 'on kyang yur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
translated: Here is the text:

original: pho long 'phang bar bya'o //
analyzed: pho long 'phang bar bya'o //

original: dge slong dag gis mun khung na mi mthong nas /
analyzed: dge slong dag gis mun khung na mi mthong nas /

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: tha gus btags te 'phang bar bya zhing /
analyzed: tha gus btags te 'phang bar bya zhing /
translated: “They should be thrown tied with a string,

original: de nas yang phyir dran par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas yang phyir dran par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: and then brought back.”

original: mdun du mar me gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyid bsal ba'i don du cho ga 'di yin te /

analyzed: 'on kyang ma sangs na ya gcig brkyang ngo zhes bya ba na /
