original: 'og ma shos kyis gzhung ni phyogs bzhir bltas te /
analyzed: 'og ma shos kyis gzhung ni phyogs bzhir bltas te /
translated: The one who is lowest should look in the four directions and say,🔽“We have performed the poṣadha.”

original: gso sbyong zhes gsungs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni sa phyogs mthon por gnas te brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas so //
analyzed: gso sbyong zhes gsungs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni sa phyogs mthon por gnas te brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas so //
translated: This is in accordance with the statement, “One should remain in a high place and examine.”

original: zhu ba las rnam pa 'di gang zhig ma gsungs pa de ni chud zos pas mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: zhu ba las rnam pa 'di gang zhig ma gsungs pa de ni chud zos pas mthong ba yin no //
translated: Since it is not stated which of these is the case, it is seen to be lost.

original: gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi tshogs pa'i skabs so //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi gzhi las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gi tshogs pa'i skabs so //
translated: This concludes the section on the assembly for the poṣadha of the chapter on the basis of the poṣadha.

original: gso sbyong bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong bya'o //
translated: The poṣadha should be performed.

original: zla ba phyed phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la'o //
analyzed: zla ba phyed phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la'o //
translated: Every half month on the fifteenth day.

original: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By reciting the Sūtra of Individual Liberation.

original: gang zhig tshes bcu bzhi dang bco lnga ba nyid la 'di mtshan mo gcig gis ma chog pas der de ring nyid du tshes bco lnga zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang zhig tshes bcu bzhi dang bco lnga ba nyid la 'di mtshan mo gcig gis ma chog pas der de ring nyid du tshes bco lnga zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Since the fourteenth and fifteenth days of the month are not complete, the fifteenth day is today.

original: gso sbyong byed pa de bas na bcu bzhi pa 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: gso sbyong byed pa de bas na bcu bzhi pa 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the purification and restoration is included in the fourteenth.

original: gang zhig mdo las gso sbyong ni gnyis te /
analyzed: gang zhig mdo las gso sbyong ni gnyis te /
translated: The sūtra says: There are two purification and restoration days:

original: bcu bzhi pa dang / bco lnga pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bcu bzhi pa dang / bco lnga pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the fourteenth and the fifteenth.

original: de ni 'dir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de ni 'dir 'gal ba med do //
translated: There is no contradiction here.

original: de nyid la 'di bstan par byas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid la 'di bstan par byas pa'o //
translated: This is taught here.

original: mtshan mo gcig chad pa dang / gzhan du gso sbyong zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa'i don du zla ba po de'i tshes grangs gang la mthar thug pa la der dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa lags te /
analyzed: mtshan mo gcig chad pa dang / gzhan du gso sbyong zhes bya ba 'dis bstan pa'i don du zla ba po de'i tshes grangs gang la mthar thug pa la der dge 'dun gyi gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa lags te /
translated: The meaning of the teaching is that when one night is cut off and purification and restoration is done elsewhere, on whatever day of the month the full moon falls, that is the fourteenth day of the Saṅgha’s purification and restoration.

original: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong bcu bzhi ba lags pas zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gso sbyong bcu bzhi ba lags pas zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be said: “I, the monk named so-and-so, have the fourteenth purification and restoration.”

original: de yang mtshan mo gcig chad pas de gso sbyong zhes bya ba bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: de yang mtshan mo gcig chad pas de gso sbyong zhes bya ba bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: Moreover, it is called poṣadha because it restores that which has been cut off for one night.

original: zla ba phyed phyed ces bya ba'i lan gnyis su smra ba ni 'dir zla ba phyed phyed ces bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: zla ba phyed phyed ces bya ba'i lan gnyis su smra ba ni 'dir zla ba phyed phyed ces bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: The repetition of “every half-month” is for the purpose of indicating the meaning of “every half-month.”

original: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is recited in the Sūtra of the Code of Individual Liberation.

original: 'dir gso sbyong gis tshul khrims gso bar byed pa yod bas ;
analyzed: 'dir gso sbyong gis tshul khrims gso bar byed pa yod bas ;
translated: Here, since morality is restored by the poṣadha,

original: de dag btsal ba'i phyir so sor thar pa'i mdog don pas so //
analyzed: de dag btsal ba'i phyir so sor thar pa'i mdog don pas so //
translated: it is recited in the Sūtra of the Code of Individual Liberation in order to seek that.

original: dran pa tsam gyis byas pa dang / ma byas ba la so sor brtag pa'o //
analyzed: dran pa tsam gyis byas pa dang / ma byas ba la so sor brtag pa'o //
translated: It is the examination of what has been done and what has not been done by mere memory.🔽It is the establishment of a straight mind and the complete avoidance of the arising of distinctions and the establishment of distinctions.

original: sems drang por bsgrub pa dang / bye brag nye bar bsgrub pa la rnam par nges pa kun nas ldang bas rang gi ngo bo dang 'bras bu las 'das par byed cing @80a * //
analyzed: sems drang por bsgrub pa dang / bye brag nye bar bsgrub pa la rnam par nges pa kun nas ldang bas rang gi ngo bo dang 'bras bu las 'das par byed cing @80a * //
translated: It is the transcendence of the essence and the result of morality by those who are different.

original: tha dad par byed pa rnams kyis tshul khrims la'o //
analyzed: tha dad par byed pa rnams kyis tshul khrims la'o //
translated: It is the differentiation of morality.

original: de ltar rnam pa 'di rnams kyis kyang tshul khrims gso bar byed pa yod pas bye brag 'di yongs su bzung ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa 'di rnams kyis kyang tshul khrims gso bar byed pa yod pas bye brag 'di yongs su bzung ba'o //
translated: Thus, these aspects also heal morality, so this distinction is fully grasped.

original: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: By reciting the Prātimokṣa Sūtra.

original: 'dul bar gtogs pa ma lus pa ston pa dang / ma lus pa bstan pa'i skabs bzlog pa'i don du dga' ba spyod pa 'di la zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i bstan pa lhag ma rnams par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'dul bar gtogs pa ma lus pa ston pa dang / ma lus pa bstan pa'i skabs bzlog pa'i don du dga' ba spyod pa 'di la zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i bstan pa lhag ma rnams par gzhag pa'o //
translated: This is the remaining teaching of the Victor, for the purpose of stopping the occasion of teaching and being taught the entire Vinaya, and for the purpose of delighting in this practice.

original: yang na slar yang /
analyzed: yang na slar yang /
translated: Or else, again,

original: gzhan dag chos dang rjes su mthun pa 'ongs par gyur na'o /
analyzed: gzhan dag chos dang rjes su mthun pa 'ongs par gyur na'o /
translated: when others come who are in accordance with the Dharma.

original: der khyed cag gis bcas pa dang rjes su bcas pa las yang dag par dga' bar gyur pa dang rjes su bstan par gyur pa rnams kyis bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: der khyed cag gis bcas pa dang rjes su bcas pa las yang dag par dga' bar gyur pa dang rjes su bstan par gyur pa rnams kyis bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: There, you should train in what is enjoined and what is enjoined upon injunctions by those who are delighted and instructed.

original: dgag dbye byas na 'di ma grub pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dgag dbye byas na 'di ma grub pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If the invitation is performed, it is not the case that this is not accomplished.

original: des dag par spyad nas de byin pas gso sbyong gi tshul khrims rgyas par byed pa'o //
analyzed: des dag par spyad nas de byin pas gso sbyong gi tshul khrims rgyas par byed pa'o //
translated: Having purified it by that, one expands the morality of the poṣadha by giving it.

original: dgag dbye byas nas slar gso sbyong mi bya'o zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: dgag dbye byas nas slar gso sbyong mi bya'o zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: The prohibition that one should not perform the poṣadha again after having performed the pravāraṇa is taught here.

original: de gnyis ni tshul khrims dag par byed pa ste /
analyzed: de gnyis ni tshul khrims dag par byed pa ste /
translated: These two purify morality.

original: de bas na dgag dbye byas pas gso sbyong 'grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na dgag dbye byas pas gso sbyong 'grub pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the poṣadha is accomplished by the pravāraṇa.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni /
translated: Here is the text:

original: phran tshegs dag las /
analyzed: phran tshegs dag las /
translated: In the Kṣudraka-piṭaka,

original: dge slong dag dgag dbye byas nas gso sbyong byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dge slong dag dgag dbye byas nas gso sbyong byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: it is said that the bhikṣus perform the poṣadha after the pravāraṇa, and the Bhagavān said:

original: dgag dbye byas nas gso sbyong mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dgag dbye byas nas gso sbyong mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “One should not perform the poṣadha after the pravāraṇa.”

original: gsol ba dang / rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin du gzhug pa sngar bya zhing de gdon to zhes bya ba ni dang por gsol ba sngon du 'gro bas rnam par gzhag pas 'dzin du gzhug par byas nas de'i rjes la so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'o //
analyzed: gsol ba dang / rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin du gzhug pa sngar bya zhing de gdon to zhes bya ba ni dang por gsol ba sngon du 'gro bas rnam par gzhag pas 'dzin du gzhug par byas nas de'i rjes la so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'o //
translated: The request and the establishment of the recitation should be done first and then that is recited. First, having done the establishment of the recitation with the request as a preliminary, then the Prātimokṣa Sūtra is recited.

original: rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin du gzhug pa ni so sor thar pa'i mdo las tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gso sbyong bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa 'dzin du gzhug pa ni so sor thar pa'i mdo las tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag gso sbyong bya ste /
translated: The presentation of the rite is established by recitation, as in the Sūtra on Individual Liberation:🔽“Venerable ones, we will perform the poṣadha purification.🔽We will recite the Sūtra on Individual Liberation.

original: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon gyis khyed cag su la ltung ba yod pa ces mthol cig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa gdon gyis khyed cag su la ltung ba yod pa ces mthol cig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Those of you who have downfalls should confess them.”

original: gleng gzhi gdon pa dang gsol ba ni tshig tu brjod pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gleng gzhi gdon pa dang gsol ba ni tshig tu brjod pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The recitation of the introduction and the request are established by the mere utterance of the words.

original: 'di gnyis ni tshig tu brjod pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di gnyis ni tshig tu brjod pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin gyi /
translated: These two are established by the mere utterance of the words.

original: thos pa bsgrags pas bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: thos pa bsgrags pas bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: They are not established by the recitation of what is heard.

original: lhag ma ni thos pa bsgrub pas kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhag ma ni thos pa bsgrub pas kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The remainder are also established by the recitation of what is heard.

original: gleng gzhi gdon pa @80b dang ; gsol ba'i lhag ma dag di thos pa bsgrags pas bsgrub par bya ba rung ba yin no //
analyzed: gleng gzhi gdon pa @80b dang ; gsol ba'i lhag ma dag di thos pa bsgrags pas bsgrub par bya ba rung ba yin no //
translated: The remainder of the recitation of the introduction and the request are suitable to be established by the recitation of what is heard.

original: kyang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgras ni tshig tu brjod pa bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: kyang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgras ni tshig tu brjod pa bsgrub par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The word “also” is connected to “the expression of words is not established.”

original: brtsams pa'i sde tshan ni rdzogs par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brtsams pa'i sde tshan ni rdzogs par bya dgos so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The class of beginnings must be completed.

original: pham par gyur pa'i sde tshan ma cung zad bton nas lhag ma de dag dang ldan par rtogs pa ni thos pa bsgrags pas zhes bya ba'i de ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: pham par gyur pa'i sde tshan ma cung zad bton nas lhag ma de dag dang ldan par rtogs pa ni thos pa bsgrags pas zhes bya ba'i de ni mi bya'o //
translated: Having recited a small portion of the class of defeats, it is not to be done by proclaiming what one has heard, thinking, “I understand the rest of them.”

original: da bzhin du dge 'dun lhag ma'i sde tshan dang ma nges pa'i sde tshan las kyang mi bya'o //
analyzed: da bzhin du dge 'dun lhag ma'i sde tshan dang ma nges pa'i sde tshan las kyang mi bya'o //
translated: In the same way, it is not to be done in the class of partial defeats and the class of undetermined matters.

original: de ltar 'phrog 'jog pa nyid skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar 'phrog 'jog pa nyid skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the state of being a thief is produced.

original: 'phrog 'jog pa ni dman par bya ba nyid do //🔽bzhi pa la reg na ril gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'phrog 'jog pa ni dman par bya ba nyid do // bzhi pa la reg na ril gyis so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Being a thief is to be treated as inferior.🔽In the fourth, if one touches, it is all.

original: ltung byed kyi bdag nyid kyi sde tshan bzhi pa las reg na thams cad rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: ltung byed kyi bdag nyid kyi sde tshan bzhi pa las reg na thams cad rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: In the fourth class of the nature of a downfall, if one touches, it is all completed.

original: so sor bshags par bya ba la sogs pa la yang 'dir thos pa bsgrags par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: so sor bshags par bya ba la sogs pa la yang 'dir thos pa bsgrags par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not the case that the meaning of one should not proclaim what one has heard is that one should not proclaim what one has heard in the confession ceremony and so on.

original: byas pa thob pa la mthar thug pa ma yin pa gtong ba legs pa nyid du yid la nges par 'brel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: byas pa thob pa la mthar thug pa ma yin pa gtong ba legs pa nyid du yid la nges par 'brel ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not certain that it is best to give up what has been done and not completed.

original: de bas na 'di rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'di rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is the presentation.

original: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa lnga po 'di rnams la gleng gzhi tshig tu brjod pas bton nas lhag ma bsgrags pas bsgrub par byar rung ngo //
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa lnga po 'di rnams la gleng gzhi tshig tu brjod pas bton nas lhag ma bsgrags pas bsgrub par byar rung ngo //
translated: In these five recitations of the Pratimokṣa Sūtra, it is suitable to recite the introduction and establish the rest by proclaiming what remains.

original: de bzhin du pham par 'gyur ba rnams sam /🔽dge 'dun lhag ma rnams sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du pham par 'gyur ba rnams sam / dge 'dun lhag ma rnams sam /
translated: Similarly, it is suitable to recite the defeats and establish the rest by proclaiming what remains.

original: ma nges pa dag tu 'dzin tu brjod pas bton nas lhag ma thos pa bsgrags pas bsgrub tu yang rung ba yang lnga pa'o //
analyzed: ma nges pa dag tu 'dzin tu brjod pas bton nas lhag ma thos pa bsgrags pas bsgrub tu yang rung ba yang lnga pa'o //
translated: Or it is suitable to recite the undetermined offenses and establish the rest by proclaiming what remains.

original: 'di la zla ba phyed 'das pa'i so sor brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di la zla ba phyed 'das pa'i so sor brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: In this case, one should examine every half month.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong la'o //
translated: In this case refers to the purification ceremony.

original: zla ba phyed 'das pa'i nyes pa dag la ci byung ba de dag so sor brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba phyed 'das pa'i nyes pa dag la ci byung ba de dag so sor brtag par bya'o //
translated: One should examine what has happened to those who have transgressed for more than half a month.

original: gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: When?

original: 'du bar 'gyur ba der ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'du bar 'gyur ba der ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said: “when there is a gathering.”

original: dge slong rnams so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i phyir 'du ba pa gang yin pa de 'du ba'i mdun rol du 'du ba la sbyor ba'i tshe /
analyzed: dge slong rnams so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa'i phyir 'du ba pa gang yin pa de 'du ba'i mdun rol du 'du ba la sbyor ba'i tshe /
translated: When the monks gather to recite the Sūtra of Individual Liberation, before the gathering, when preparing for the gathering,

original: lhag ma ni tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lhag ma ni tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the rest is the meaning of “assembly.”

original: ci so sor brtags nas ltung ba phyir ma bcos pa kho nar 'dug par bya ba'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci so sor brtags nas ltung ba phyir ma bcos pa kho nar 'dug par bya ba'am zhe na /
translated: Should one remain with an uncorrected downfall after examining it?

original: de'i phyir shes pa phyir bcos te thams cad du 'dug par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /🔽ltung ba nges par shes pa'am /
analyzed: de'i phyir shes pa phyir bcos te thams cad du 'dug par bya'o zhes bya ba smos te / ltung ba nges par shes pa'am /
translated: Therefore, it is said: “Having corrected the known, one should remain in all cases.”🔽Having corrected the known downfall,

original: yid gnyis dang bcas pa shes pa phyir bcos te /🔽dgag dbye la sogs pa'i las @81a * //
analyzed: yid gnyis dang bcas pa shes pa phyir bcos te / dgag dbye la sogs pa'i las @81a * //
translated: or having corrected the known doubt,

original: thams cad 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad 'dug par bya'o //
translated: in all cases one should remain in the actions such as the lifting of restrictions, etc.

original: gso sbyong nyid la yid gnyis kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gso sbyong nyid la yid gnyis kyis ni ma yin te /
translated: But not with doubt about the purification itself.

original: de la dge slong mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris nas yid gnyis dang bral par byas te /
analyzed: de la dge slong mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la dris nas yid gnyis dang bral par byas te /
translated: The monks who uphold the sutras, the Vinaya, and the mātṛkā should be asked about it, and one should be free from doubt.

original: phyir bcos pa zhes bya ba ni shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir bcos pa zhes bya ba ni shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The so-called amendment should be understood by implication.

original: 'dug pa na dran nam yid gnyis za na drung na mo la byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dug pa na dran nam yid gnyis za na drung na mo la byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one remembers while sitting or has doubts, one should seek approval from a monk sitting nearby.

original: gal te der 'dug pa 'di la ltung ba'i yul can dran pa bcos su yod par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te der 'dug pa 'di la ltung ba'i yul can dran pa bcos su yod par gyur na /
translated: If one remembers while sitting there that one has the object of a downfall,

original: gang zhig drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong de la byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
analyzed: gang zhig drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong de la byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
translated: one should seek approval from a monk sitting nearby.

original: mdun nas bya'i glo nas mi bya'o //
analyzed: mdun nas bya'i glo nas mi bya'o //
translated: One should seek approval from in front, not from the side.

original: de na nges pa las shes pa'o //
analyzed: de na nges pa las shes pa'o //
translated: One should understand from the certainty there.

original: shin tu 'da' bar byed pas dgos pa med pa de bas na 'di brten pa'o //🔽las byed pas ni sems kyis so zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'jug pa nyid na ltung ba dran nam /
analyzed: shin tu 'da' bar byed pas dgos pa med pa de bas na 'di brten pa'o // las byed pas ni sems kyis so zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'jug pa nyid na ltung ba dran nam /
translated: Since one should not transgress, this is the support.🔽 By the action, by the mind.

original: yid gnyis za na byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yid gnyis za na byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Thus, if one remembers the downfall while engaging in it, or has doubts, one should seek approval, one should connect it in this way.

original: las byed pa po gang zhig dran nam de la yid gnyis za na ltung byed yul des de rang gi sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: las byed pa po gang zhig dran nam de la yid gnyis za na ltung byed yul des de rang gi sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If he is unsure of the person who is the object of the offense, then he should consecrate himself with his own mind.

original: 'dir dus ring du 'da' bar byed pa ni ma gus pa skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir dus ring du 'da' bar byed pa ni ma gus pa skyes pa yin te /
translated: Here, to let a long time pass is to give rise to disrespect.

original: de bas na lan cig kho nas byin gyis brlab pa yin gyi lan gsum du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na lan cig kho nas byin gyis brlab pa yin gyi lan gsum du ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, he consecrates himself only once, not three times.

original: gal te tshes bco lnga la bdag gcig pu de dang mi ldan par shes na 'grogs pa shes la drang por 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gal te tshes bco lnga la bdag gcig pu de dang mi ldan par shes na 'grogs pa shes la drang por 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If he knows that on the fifteenth day he is alone and without that offense, he should know the companion and strive to be honest.

original: gal te dge slong gis gso sbyong gi nyi ma bdag gcig bu ltung ba de dang mi ldan zhing /
analyzed: gal te dge slong gis gso sbyong gi nyi ma bdag gcig bu ltung ba de dang mi ldan zhing /
translated: If a monk knows that on the Poṣadha day he is alone and without that offense,

original: dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba mthun pa dang ldan par shes na /
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba mthun pa dang ldan par shes na /
translated: and if he knows that the entire Saṅgha is endowed with the same offense,

original: gang zhig tshes bco lnga la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba med par bsam par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang zhig tshes bco lnga la dge 'dun thams cad ltung ba med par bsam par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: then he should think that on the fifteenth day the entire Saṅgha is without offense.

original: bco lnga pa kho na gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa zhes bya bar gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa 'dir sgra gzhan gyis 'dir gso sbyong dag dang / dgag dbye'i bar chad bsal bar bya ba'i skabs kyis 'dir smos kyi /
analyzed: bco lnga pa kho na gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa zhes bya bar gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa 'dir sgra gzhan gyis 'dir gso sbyong dag dang / dgag dbye'i bar chad bsal bar bya ba'i skabs kyis 'dir smos kyi /
translated: Here, the terms “purification” and “obstacle to the end of the rainy season retreat” are used in this context.

original: dus gzhan la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dus gzhan la ni ma yin no //
translated: But not at other times.

original: 'di la bya ba ma yin pa nyid na /
analyzed: 'di la bya ba ma yin pa nyid na /
translated: If this is not to be done,

original: ji ltar 'bad par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'bad par bya zhe na /
translated: how should one strive?

original: de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa 'di dang 'di ltar byed pa gang yin pa des cir 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa 'di dang 'di ltar byed pa gang yin pa des cir 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, “Venerable, what happens if one acts in this way?”

original: ltung ba dang bcas par ro //
analyzed: ltung ba dang bcas par ro //
translated: “One becomes guilty of a downfall.”

original: 'o na tshe dang ldan pas kyang 'di dang 'di ltar byas sam byas so //
analyzed: 'o na tshe dang ldan pas kyang 'di dang 'di ltar byas sam byas so //
translated: “Venerable, did you act in this way or not?”

original: 'o na tshe dang ldan pa yang ltung ba dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'o na tshe dang ldan pa yang ltung ba dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: “Venerable, you are also guilty of a downfall.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa @81b kho bo gcig pur ma zad kyi /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa @81b kho bo gcig pur ma zad kyi /
translated: “Venerable, it is not only me.

original: dge 'dun thams cad don de dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun thams cad don de dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The entire saṅgha is guilty of this matter.”

original: kye tshe dang ldan pa je khyod rang gi ltung ba chos bzhin du phyir gyis shig / dge 'dun thams cad kyis khyed la ci 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rtsom pas mig lam du lhag ma 'dod pa rnams 'chags su gzhug go zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: kye tshe dang ldan pa je khyod rang gi ltung ba chos bzhin du phyir gyis shig / dge 'dun thams cad kyis khyed la ci 'gyur zhes bya ba'i rtsom pas mig lam du lhag ma 'dod pa rnams 'chags su gzhug go zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The word commencement in the phrase by the commencement of the Saṅgha saying to you, 'What will become of you?'''

original: rtsom pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dang gzhan rnams thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtsom pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dang gzhan rnams thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means all the other words.

original: 'di la mi 'dod pa de la gleng bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di la mi 'dod pa de la gleng bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should not accuse him of that which he does not want.

original: 'di la zhes bya ba ni ltung ba la'o //
analyzed: 'di la zhes bya ba ni ltung ba la'o //
translated: In this phrase, in this refers to the downfall.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni mnyes gshin pa dang bcas pa de la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni mnyes gshin pa dang bcas pa de la'o //
translated: In this phrase, him refers to the one who is accused.

original: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'i bar chad spang bar bya ba'i phyir bkag pa yin no //🔽'o na gal te /
analyzed: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'i bar chad spang bar bya ba'i phyir bkag pa yin no // 'o na gal te /
translated: This is a prohibition in order to avoid obstacles to the poṣadha and pravāraṇa.

original: 'di ltar dran du bcug pa mi 'dod na 'di gso sbyong ngam /
analyzed: 'di ltar dran du bcug pa mi 'dod na 'di gso sbyong ngam /
translated: If one does not want to be reminded in this way,

original: dgag dbye ma dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgag dbye ma dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the poṣadha and pravāraṇa will be impure.

original: dag pa rnams kyis las rnams nyams su myong ba la nyes byas gang yin pa de ji ltar mi 'grub ces bya'o //
analyzed: dag pa rnams kyis las rnams nyams su myong ba la nyes byas gang yin pa de ji ltar mi 'grub ces bya'o //
translated: How can it be that the pure ones do not experience the karma of a misdeed?

original: de'i phyir mi 'dod pa zhes bya ba dmigs kyis bsal bar gyur pa'i tshig las ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi 'dod pa zhes bya ba dmigs kyis bsal bar gyur pa'i tshig las ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, “undesirable” is a word that excludes the unestablished.

original: gal te tshes bco lnga la thams cad kyis ltung ba shes sam /
analyzed: gal te tshes bco lnga la thams cad kyis ltung ba shes sam /
translated: If on the fifteenth day, all know the downfall,

original: yid gnyis su gyur na len par byed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir dge slong 'ga' zhig la phyir bcos pa'i don du gnas gzhan du gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yid gnyis su gyur na len par byed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir dge slong 'ga' zhig la phyir bcos pa'i don du gnas gzhan du gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: or if they have doubts, in order to establish the acceptance, a certain monk should be sent to another place for the purpose of amendment.

original: rang zhes bya ba ni 'dir bzhag bzhin pa'i tshig bla dags so //
analyzed: rang zhes bya ba ni 'dir bzhag bzhin pa'i tshig bla dags so //
translated: “Here” is a word for remaining.

original: len pa byed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: len pa byed pa bsgrub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In order to establish the acceptance” means

original: gang de rnams kyi ltung ba bstan pa de len par byed pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: gang de rnams kyi ltung ba bstan pa de len par byed pa'i don du'o //
translated: for the purpose of accepting the downfalls that are revealed to them.

original: gang gi phyir don 'di ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don 'di ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because this meaning is established in that way.

original: ma grub na byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma grub na byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
translated: If it is not established, in order to bless,

original: gsol ba bya ba 'dod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsol ba bya ba 'dod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The motion is to be made.🔽If he is not established,

original: ma grub na zhes bya ba la ni cho ga 'di'o //
analyzed: ma grub na zhes bya ba la ni cho ga 'di'o //
translated: in this rite,

original: ji skad du bstan pa'i cho ga de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gsol bas ltung ba byin gyis brlabs la gso sbyong ngam dgag dbye'i las mi shol bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bstan pa'i cho ga de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gsol bas ltung ba byin gyis brlabs la gso sbyong ngam dgag dbye'i las mi shol bar bya'o //
translated: the rite as taught, the Saṅgha of monks, having made the motion, should bless the downfall, and should not postpone the karma of poṣadha or the lifting of restrictions.

original: gsol ba bya ba 'dod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsol ba bya ba 'dod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The motion is to be made.

original: so sor byin gyis brlab pas 'di la dag pa mi 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: so sor byin gyis brlab pas 'di la dag pa mi 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: The purification is not accomplished by the individual consecration.🔽It is not to be spoken of here.🔽Here, this aspect is not to be relied upon.

original: de 'dir brjod par mi bya zhes bya ba 'dir rnam pa 'di la brten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i don du de skad brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dir brjod par mi bya zhes bya ba 'dir rnam pa 'di la brten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba bstan pa'i don du de skad brjod pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the teaching is expressed in this way.

original: bzhi pas nyung ba nyid la yang gtsug lag khang gi bya ba gnas pa @82a * //
analyzed: bzhi pas nyung ba nyid la yang gtsug lag khang gi bya ba gnas pa @82a * //
translated: In the fourth, even if there are fewer than four, the activity of the monastery is to be done by those who are present.

original: kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is because

original: gtsug lag khang gcig na /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang gcig na /
translated: in one monastery,

original: dge slong gsum mam /
analyzed: dge slong gsum mam /
translated: there are three monks or

original: gnyis sam gcig kho na 'dug na yang des phyag dar la sogs pa gtsug lag khang gi bya ba gdon mi za bar bya dgos so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis sam gcig kho na 'dug na yang des phyag dar la sogs pa gtsug lag khang gi bya ba gdon mi za bar bya dgos so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he should not leave the monastery.

original: 'dug pa po rnams kyi don du stan rnams gnang ba de med pas /
analyzed: 'dug pa po rnams kyi don du stan rnams gnang ba de med pas /
translated: Since there is no permission to use the seats for the sake of those who are staying,

original: de'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi bya ba ma yin snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi bya ba ma yin snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: at that time, in order to dispel the doubt that it is not the duty of the monastery,

original: stan thabs nyams par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos te 'ongs srid pas de'i don du med par brten par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i blo gros so //
analyzed: stan thabs nyams par mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos te 'ongs srid pas de'i don du med par brten par bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i blo gros so //
translated: it is said that the seats should not be damaged. The idea is that since it is possible that they will come, they should not be left without purpose.

original: chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / lci ba sar pas byug pa bya ba dang / seng ge'i khri bsham pa dang / mar me gzugs pa dang chos nyam du gzhug pa dag byas la phyogs ches mthon bor 'dug ste /
analyzed: chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / lci ba sar pas byug pa bya ba dang / seng ge'i khri bsham pa dang / mar me gzugs pa dang chos nyam du gzhug pa dag byas la phyogs ches mthon bor 'dug ste /
translated: Having performed the duties of the monastery, such as sprinkling, sweeping, anointing with fresh cow dung, arranging the lion's seat, lighting lamps, and entering the Dharma, he should sit in a very high place

original: phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: and look in the four directions.

original: 'di ltar lta bar byed pa rnams kyis blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar lta bar byed pa rnams kyis blta bar bya ste /
translated: Thus, those who wish to see should look.

original: go rims bstan pa'i don du de ltar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: go rims bstan pa'i don du de ltar bsams pa'o //
translated: This is thought in order to teach the sequence.

original: dge slong dag 'ong ba snang na /
analyzed: dge slong dag 'ong ba snang na /
translated: Monks, if you see that the time is approaching,

original: kye tshe dang ldan pa myur ba myur bar shog shig deng dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong ngam /
analyzed: kye tshe dang ldan pa myur ba myur bar shog shig deng dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong ngam /
translated: you should say, “O venerable ones, come quickly! Today is the poṣadha of the saṃgha,

original: dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dgag dbye bco lnga pa yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: or the fifteenth day of the confession ceremony.”

original: dgag dbye la bco lnga zhes bya ba shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: dgag dbye la bco lnga zhes bya ba shugs kyis rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Here, “fifteenth day of the confession ceremony” should be understood by implication.

original: 'di ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni mtshon pa tsam yin te /
translated: This is just an illustration.

original: gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa de bas na 'di la mi bya ba nyid du shes par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong bcu bzhi pa de bas na 'di la mi bya ba nyid du shes par mi bya'o //
translated: The fourteenth day of poṣadha should not be understood as not to be done.

original: bzhir ma tshang na dus kyi bar du bsdad de byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bzhir ma tshang na dus kyi bar du bsdad de byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If there are less than four, one should stay until the time and then perform the consecration.

original: dge slong bzhir ma tshang na /🔽skya rengs ma shar tshun chad du bsdad de /
analyzed: dge slong bzhir ma tshang na / skya rengs ma shar tshun chad du bsdad de /
translated: If there are less than four monks,🔽one should stay until dawn.

original: dus su ma 'ongs na gso sbyong dang dgag dbye byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus su ma 'ongs na gso sbyong dang dgag dbye byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If one does not arrive in time, one should perform the consecration of the poṣadha and the confession ceremony. This is the meaning.

original: 'di ni ma mo las so //🔽'ba' zhig na 'dug ste'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di ni ma mo las so // 'ba' zhig na 'dug ste'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the rite of the Mātṛkā.🔽“If he is alone, he should sit on that seat” means:

original: gal te gcig pu 'dug na stan de la 'dug ste /
analyzed: gal te gcig pu 'dug na stan de la 'dug ste /
translated: if he is alone, he should sit on that seat.

original: des gso sbyong dang dgag dbye byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: des gso sbyong dang dgag dbye byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: He should bless the Poṣadha and the Pravāraṇā.

original: lhag ma gzhan dang bcas pa nyid yin na mdun du'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lhag ma gzhan dang bcas pa nyid yin na mdun du'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The rest, if he is with others, in front” means:

original: gzhan dang bcas pa ni gzhan dang lhan cig go //
analyzed: gzhan dang bcas pa ni gzhan dang lhan cig go //
translated: “with others” means with others.

original: gal te gnyis pa yod par gyur na de'i mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug ste /
analyzed: gal te gnyis pa yod par gyur na de'i mdun du tsog tsog por 'dug ste /
translated: If there is a second, he should sit in front of him, squatting.

original: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa la gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni nges pa la gtogs pa'o //
translated: He should bless the Poṣadha and the Pravāraṇā. This is the rule.🔽“The third, if he is with others, sitting” means:

original: gsum pa la ni rnam pa gzhan du bstan pa'i phyir @82b gsum ni 'khod de'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gsum pa la ni rnam pa gzhan du bstan pa'i phyir @82b gsum ni 'khod de'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: the third, if he is with others, sitting in a row.🔽He should bless the Poṣadha and the Pravāraṇā. This is the rule.🔽“The fourth, if he is with others, standing” means:🔽the fourth, if he is with others, standing.

original: ji ltar dge 'dun gral rims bzhin du 'khod de byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar dge 'dun gral rims bzhin du 'khod de byin gyis brlab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He should bless the Poṣadha and the Pravāraṇā. This is the rule.

original: bzhi'i dgag dbye yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bzhi'i dgag dbye yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “The Pravāraṇā of the fourth is also like that” means:

original: ji ltar dge slong gsum gyis gso sbyong byin gyis brlab par bya ba bzhin du bzhi'i yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar dge slong gsum gyis gso sbyong byin gyis brlab par bya ba bzhin du bzhi'i yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as three monks should do the purification ceremony, so should four.

original: de'i tshe gnas na so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon nus pa med par shes na gso sbyong la bsdad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i tshe gnas na so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon nus pa med par shes na gso sbyong la bsdad par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: At that time, if one knows that one is unable to recite the Prātimokṣa Sūtra in that place, one should not stay for the purification ceremony.

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba la ni gso sbyong la ltos pa'i gso sbyong gi dus la gang du ston pa po med par gyur na zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba la ni gso sbyong la ltos pa'i gso sbyong gi dus la gang du ston pa po med par gyur na zhes bya'o //
translated: At that time means at the time of the purification ceremony, when the teacher is absent.

original: gang na de las 'da' bar der nye bar 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang na de las 'da' bar der nye bar 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: Where one should not go beyond that, there one should not approach.

original: de las zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong la'o //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong la'o //
translated: That means the purification ceremony.

original: mdo 'don nus pa med pa la ni 'di smos so //
analyzed: mdo 'don nus pa med pa la ni 'di smos so //
translated: This refers to the absence of the ability to recite the sūtra.

original: tshogs pa med pa la yang de nyid kyi phyir 'di'i ltung ba ste /
analyzed: tshogs pa med pa la yang de nyid kyi phyir 'di'i ltung ba ste /
translated: In the absence of an assembly, it is also because of that that this is a downfall.

original: bar chad gzhan gyis bstan pa med pa la de bas na 'di ltar bya'o //
analyzed: bar chad gzhan gyis bstan pa med pa la de bas na 'di ltar bya'o //
translated: In the absence of teaching due to other obstacles, therefore it should be done like this.

original: gnas par khas blangs pa phyi ma'i gong ma bsrung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas par khas blangs pa phyi ma'i gong ma bsrung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of one should not protect the later promise of abiding is that one should not protect the earlier promise by the later promise.

original: khas blangs pa phyi ma shos kyis snga ma de bsrung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khas blangs pa phyi ma shos kyis snga ma de bsrung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of one should not protect the later promise is that one should not protect the earlier promise by the later promise.

original: phyi ma shos 'gro ba'i phyir snga ma de sgrub pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: phyi ma shos 'gro ba'i phyir snga ma de sgrub pa zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the later one is for going is that the earlier one is for accomplishing.

original: de bas na snga ma gzhan las dbyar dral ba la phyi ma khas blangs bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis de byas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na snga ma gzhan las dbyar dral ba la phyi ma khas blangs bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'dis de byas par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should make the later promise for the earlier one who is leaving the rains retreat.

original: de la yang zla ba gnyis las lhag pa'o zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa phyi ma shos de zla ba gnyis bsrung gi gnyis las lhag pa gsum pa bsrung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la yang zla ba gnyis las lhag pa'o zhes bya ba ni khas blangs pa phyi ma shos de zla ba gnyis bsrung gi gnyis las lhag pa gsum pa bsrung bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: In that, more than two months means that the later promise should be protected for two months, but not for three months or more than that.

original: gnas dang las dang rnyed pa dang bsnyen bkur bstabs pas gdon par byed pa bsnyen par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas dang las dang rnyed pa dang bsnyen bkur bstabs pas gdon par byed pa bsnyen par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should be served by giving away dwelling, work, gain, and honor.

original: 'di 'don pa po'i phyir 'bad par byed pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di 'don pa po'i phyir 'bad par byed pa med pa'o //
translated: This means that one should not strive for the sake of the reciter.

original: de bas na ma grub pa la 'bad pa de lta bu byas nas kyang cho ga bya ba la rjes su bsgrub pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na ma grub pa la 'bad pa de lta bu byas nas kyang cho ga bya ba la rjes su bsgrub pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, even though one has made such an effort to establish oneself, one should know that the rite is to be performed as a subsequent practice.

original: 'dir gnas zhes bya ba ni gnas khang dang / mal cha dang / stan dang bgo ba la sogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gnas zhes bya ba ni gnas khang dang / mal cha dang / stan dang bgo ba la sogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the term “place” should be understood as the dwelling place, bedding, seat, clothing, etc.

original: las zhes bya ba ni gang gi las te de dag tu mi bsko ba'o //
analyzed: las zhes bya ba ni gang gi las te de dag tu mi bsko ba'o //
translated: The term “work” is that for which one is not appointed to those places.

original: rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang snum bag la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnyed pa zhes bya ba ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang snum bag la sogs pa'o //
translated: The term “gain” is Dharma robes, alms, oil for the body, etc.

original: 'di dag gis bsnyen bkur pa stabs pa ni 'dod pa 'di dag gis ma bral ba nyid du nges par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gis bsnyen bkur pa stabs pa ni 'dod pa 'di dag gis ma bral ba nyid du nges par byed pa'o //
translated: The term “honor” is the service of these.

original: mdo sde 'dzin pa 'ong ba na gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dag gis bsu bar @83a * //
analyzed: mdo sde 'dzin pa 'ong ba na gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dag gis bsu bar @83a * //
translated: When the Sūtra-holder comes, one should receive him with parasols, banners, flags, etc.

original: bya'o ; /'dul ba dang ma mo yang ngo zhes bya ba na 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa 'ong ba la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dang la sogs pa dag gis bsu bar bya'o //
analyzed: bya'o ; /'dul ba dang ma mo yang ngo zhes bya ba na 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo 'dzin pa 'ong ba la gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dang la sogs pa dag gis bsu bar bya'o //
translated: When the Vinaya-holder and the Abhidharma-holder come, one should receive them with parasols, banners,

original: lam ji srid du zhe na /
analyzed: lam ji srid du zhe na /
translated: How far should one go to receive them?🔽Therefore it is said,

original: de'i phyir dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du'o //
translated: up to half a yojana.

original: ma nus rgyang grags lngar ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ma nus rgyang grags lngar ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If one is unable, up to five krośas.

original: lam de tsam du bsu bar mi nus na rgyang grags lngar bsu bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lam de tsam du bsu bar mi nus na rgyang grags lngar bsu bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If one is unable to receive them for that much of the way, one should receive them for five krośas. This is the meaning.

original: gsum mam dpag tshad phyed dam rgyang grags sam rgyang grags phyed dam khyams su rung ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsum mam dpag tshad phyed dam rgyang grags sam rgyang grags phyed dam khyams su rung ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: Three, half a yojana, a krośa, half a krośa, or a courtyard is suitable.

original: gsum zhes bya ba ni rgyang grags rnams kyang ngo //
analyzed: gsum zhes bya ba ni rgyang grags rnams kyang ngo //
translated: Three means also krośas.

original: ma nus na zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma nus na zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: If one is unable, this should be applied to all.

original: de ltar bsu nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar bsu nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Having received them in this way, what should one do?

original: de'i phyir ngag gi bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ngag gi bshes pa'i tshig gis bsu nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should welcome him with the words of a spiritual friend and receive his alms-bowl and robes.

original: khrus bya'o // dge 'dun la yang snum bag gis rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: khrus bya'o // dge 'dun la yang snum bag gis rnyed pa'o //
translated: One should bathe him and give him the offerings of the Saṅgha, such as oil-cakes.

original: gnas la sogs pa bstabs pa sbyin no //
analyzed: gnas la sogs pa bstabs pa sbyin no //
translated: One should offer him a dwelling place, etc.

original: chos nyan pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos nyan pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should listen to the Dharma.

original: sbyin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: sbyin no zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: One should give, i.e., offer him a dwelling place, etc.

original: der thams cad kyis spro ba bskyed par bya zhes bya ba ni mang po'i tshig gis bstan pa de rnams thams cad kyis smra bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der thams cad kyis spro ba bskyed par bya zhes bya ba ni mang po'i tshig gis bstan pa de rnams thams cad kyis smra bar mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: All of them should encourage him, i.e., all of them should encourage him with the words of the scriptures.

original: dge slong phrag dog can la 'di dag ston par 'dzin pa yin no zhes go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /🔽'di ston pa'o 'di ni ston te 'di lta ste /
analyzed: dge slong phrag dog can la 'di dag ston par 'dzin pa yin no zhes go bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni / 'di ston pa'o 'di ni ston te 'di lta ste /
translated: One should make him understand that the jealous monks are upholding the Teacher.🔽This is the Teacher, this is being taught, i.e., this is the Teacher, this is being taught by the Teacher.

original: mdo sde dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo zhes gsungs pa de 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: mdo sde dang 'dul ba 'dzin pa dang ma mo zhes gsungs pa de 'dis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: This is the Sūtra-holder, the Vinaya-holder, and the Mātikā-holder.

original: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye ma byas pas de'i nyin mo rang gi de yod pa'i gnas nas 'gro bar mi bya ste /🔽gal te de nyid kyi tshe rnam pa de lta bur phyin pa'am /
analyzed: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye ma byas pas de'i nyin mo rang gi de yod pa'i gnas nas 'gro bar mi bya ste / gal te de nyid kyi tshe rnam pa de lta bur phyin pa'am /
translated: One should not go to another monastery on the day of the observance or invitation ceremony, because the observance or invitation ceremony is being performed there.🔽If one goes to another monastery on that day, one should not go to a monastery of a different Buddhist school.

original: 'thab krol can dag dang dbral ba'am ;
analyzed: 'thab krol can dag dang dbral ba'am ;
translated: If one goes to a monastery of a different Buddhist school, one should not go to a monastery where there is strife or where there is no harmony.

original: spyod pa bzang po dag dang phrad pa de lta bur 'gro ba nyid ma yin na'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: spyod pa bzang po dag dang phrad pa de lta bur 'gro ba nyid ma yin na'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: If one goes to a monastery where there is harmony, one should not go to a monastery where the conduct is not good.

original: de'i nyin mo zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'i nyin mo la'o //
analyzed: de'i nyin mo zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'i nyin mo la'o //
translated: On that day means on the day of the observance or invitation ceremony.

original: rang gi zhes bya ba ni dge slong rnams dang lhan cig mdo 'don pa dang spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rang gi zhes bya ba ni dge slong rnams dang lhan cig mdo 'don pa dang spyod pa'o //
translated: One’s own means the recitation of the scriptures and conduct that are done together with the monks.

original: yang na rang gi zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma'i dgag dbye dge slong dang dge slong ma rnams lhan cig tu mdo 'don pa'i tshe dge slong gi tshogs pa grub pa dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig tu'o //
analyzed: yang na rang gi zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma'i dgag dbye dge slong dang dge slong ma rnams lhan cig tu mdo 'don pa'i tshe dge slong gi tshogs pa grub pa dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig tu'o //
translated: Or, one’s own means the invitation ceremony of the nuns, which is done together with the monks and nuns. When the assembly of monks is complete, it is done together with the nuns.

original: de zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong dang dgag dbye la ltos nas bdag nyid kyis gso sbyong ngam dgag dbye rab tu shes bzhin du rang dgag dbye nyid du zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong dang dgag dbye la ltos nas bdag nyid kyis gso sbyong ngam dgag dbye rab tu shes bzhin du rang dgag dbye nyid du zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase in that way refers to the fact that, in relation to the poṣadha ceremony and the invitation ceremony, one is fully aware that one is participating in the poṣadha ceremony or the invitation ceremony oneself.🔽The phrase at that time refers to the fact that one is fully aware of the situation on the very day of the poṣadha ceremony or the invitation ceremony.

original: @83b de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'i nyi ma de nyid la rnam pa de lta bu'i tshig gis rab tu shes bzhin pa de bas na gnas 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: @83b de nyid kyi tshe zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'i nyi ma de nyid la rnam pa de lta bu'i tshig gis rab tu shes bzhin pa de bas na gnas 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The phrase in that way refers to the fact that one is fully aware of the situation by means of the words that were spoken. Therefore, one is a holder of the site.

original: 'thab krel can zhes bya ba ni 'thab krol byed pa po rnams las bdag 'bral bar 'gyur snyam nas gal te 'di nyid gzhan dbang nyid du thob par byed pa'o //🔽spyod pa bzang po dag dang phrad pa de lta bur 'gro ba nyid ma yin na'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'thab krel can zhes bya ba ni 'thab krol byed pa po rnams las bdag 'bral bar 'gyur snyam nas gal te 'di nyid gzhan dbang nyid du thob par byed pa'o // spyod pa bzang po dag dang phrad pa de lta bur 'gro ba nyid ma yin na'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase in order to avoid conflict means that one is fully aware that one will be separated from those who are engaged in conflict and that one will attain a state of independence from them.🔽The phrase one does not go to a place where one will encounter those who are of good character means that one is fully aware that one will not go to a place where one will encounter those who are of good character.

original: gal te spyod pa bzang po dag phrad pa de lta bu 'gro ba nyid yin na 'gro ba la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gal te spyod pa bzang po dag phrad pa de lta bu 'gro ba nyid yin na 'gro ba la nyes pa med do //
translated: If one were to go to a place where one would encounter those who are of good character, there would be no fault in doing so.

original: gnas gang na rang gi gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'am /
analyzed: gnas gang na rang gi gso sbyong dang dgag dbye'am /
translated: If there is no place where one can perform the poṣadha or the pravāraṇa,

original: gzhan gang yang rung ba med par gyur na yang gnas de nas 'gro bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan gang yang rung ba med par gyur na yang gnas de nas 'gro bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: or any other rite, one should leave that place.

original: de la ston pas kyang de lta bu'i 'thab krol can ma yin pa rang 'jug pa rnams la yang gso sbyong dang rnam par dag pa khas len pa dgag dbyes kyang ngo //
analyzed: de la ston pas kyang de lta bu'i 'thab krol can ma yin pa rang 'jug pa rnams la yang gso sbyong dang rnam par dag pa khas len pa dgag dbyes kyang ngo //
translated: The Master has also said that one should not accept the poṣadha or the pravāraṇa in such a place, even if one is not quarrelsome and is inclined to live alone.

original: gang na 'ongs pa med na gcig pu rab tu zhi ba'i sems kyis spyod pa bzang po'i nang nag gnas pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga rol du dge slong dag dang bcas pa'i gnas nas gnas med kyang dge slong de 'gro bar bya ste /
analyzed: gang na 'ongs pa med na gcig pu rab tu zhi ba'i sems kyis spyod pa bzang po'i nang nag gnas pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i snga rol du dge slong dag dang bcas pa'i gnas nas gnas med kyang dge slong de 'gro bar bya ste /
translated: If one cannot go to a place where there are other monks, one should leave the place where one is, even if it is a place where monks are living, before the beginning of the observance of the good conduct of the solitary bodhisattva.

original: gang na dge slong tshul khrims yongs su dag pa lta ba mthun pa dag pas 'dzin pa dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o zhes mdor byas so //
analyzed: gang na dge slong tshul khrims yongs su dag pa lta ba mthun pa dag pas 'dzin pa dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o zhes mdor byas so //
translated: One should go to a place where there are other monks, to a place where there are monks who are pure in morality and who agree with one’s view.

original: 'dir lta ba yang tshul khrims nyid kyis smos par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir lta ba yang tshul khrims nyid kyis smos par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the view should be understood to be included in morality.

original: gnas gang na dge slong dang bcas kyang dge slong 'thab krol byed pa yod pa der 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas gang na dge slong dang bcas kyang dge slong 'thab krol byed pa yod pa der 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not go to a place where there are monks who are quarrelsome, even if there are other monks there.

original: gang zhig 'thab krol byed pa spang pa'i phyir gso sbyong dang dgag dbye dag bshol bar gsungs pa de ni 'thab krol can dag ces bya ba'i mdor byas so //
analyzed: gang zhig 'thab krol byed pa spang pa'i phyir gso sbyong dang dgag dbye dag bshol bar gsungs pa de ni 'thab krol can dag ces bya ba'i mdor byas so //
translated: The sūtra in brief says that one should not go to a place where there are monks who are quarrelsome, in order to avoid quarrels.

original: gang gi phyir der 'gro ba bkag pa de'i phyir spyod pa bzang po can gyi dge slong dang bcas pa nas 'thab krol can gyi dge slong dang bcas par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir der 'gro ba bkag pa de'i phyir spyod pa bzang po can gyi dge slong dang bcas pa nas 'thab krol can gyi dge slong dang bcas par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Because going there is prohibited, therefore it is said that one should not go to a place where there are monks who are quarrelsome, even if there are monks who are of good conduct there.

original: dge slong med par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i nyes pa gzhan ston pa'i tshig bsdu ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dge slong med par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i nyes pa gzhan ston pa'i tshig bsdu ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to show another fault, that one should not go to a place where there are no monks, the text is summarized.

original: dge slong dang bcas pa nas dge slong med par lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig ma yin pa'am gnod pa dang lus dang sems shin tu sbangs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dge slong dang bcas pa nas dge slong med par lhag ma rnams dang lhan cig ma yin pa'am gnod pa dang lus dang sems shin tu sbangs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: One should not go to a place where there are no monks, except when accompanied by other fully ordained monks, or when there is a reason such as physical or mental exhaustion.

original: ci dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dan yang lhan cig tu mi rigs sam zhe na /
analyzed: ci dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dan yang lhan cig tu mi rigs sam zhe na /
translated: If one stays in a place with fully ordained monks, is it not appropriate to stay with them?

original: de'i phyir 'dir lhag ma rnams dan lhan cig ma yin par zhes bya ba smos te /🔽dge @84a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir lhag ma rnams dan lhan cig ma yin par zhes bya ba smos te / dge @84a * //
translated: Therefore it says here, “One should not go to a place where there are no monks, except when accompanied by other fully ordained monks.”

original: slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sa ma gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis so //
analyzed: slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sa ma gtsug lag khang na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis so //
translated: The fully ordained monks who stay in the monastery with the fully ordained monks.

original: ci 'di nges pa kho nar yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci 'di nges pa kho nar yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is this a definite rule?

original: de'i phyir lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i dbang ma gtogs par zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “except when there is a reason such as physical or mental exhaustion.”

original: gal te der song nas lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur zhang de'i dbang gis ni dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas nas dge slong med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽dge slong gso sbyong rjes su gzung bar bya ba nyid du gyur pas kyang rung ba nyid dang thugs brtse ba nyid ces bya ba 'di rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te der song nas lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa skye bar 'gyur zhang de'i dbang gis ni dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas nas dge slong med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // dge slong gso sbyong rjes su gzung bar bya ba nyid du gyur pas kyang rung ba nyid dang thugs brtse ba nyid ces bya ba 'di rigs pa yin te /
translated: If, by going there, one generates pliancy of body and mind, then by the power of that, one should go from a place with monks to a place without monks.🔽It is proper for a monk to accept the poṣadha ceremony, and it is proper for him to bless the poṣadha and the pravāraṇa ceremony for the sake of the nuns, out of compassion for them.

original: de'i don du gso sbyong dang dgag dbye dag byin gyis brlab pa tsam du rigs pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de'i don du gso sbyong dang dgag dbye dag byin gyis brlab pa tsam du rigs pa kho na yin no //
translated: It is proper for him to do only that much.

original: 'gro ba'i phyir gnas pa'i gso sbyong dang dgag dbye ma byas par dor bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i phyir gnas pa'i gso sbyong dang dgag dbye ma byas par dor bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not abandon the poṣadha and pravāraṇa ceremonies of the place where one is staying, in order to go to another place.

original: de'i nyin mo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i nyin mo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: This should be applied to the day of the poṣadha ceremony.

original: rkyen de lta bu nyid yod na spyod pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa dang ldan pa'i gnas bstan nas der 'gror gzhug bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyod pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang / bstan pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: rkyen de lta bu nyid yod na spyod pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa dang ldan pa'i gnas bstan nas der 'gror gzhug bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyod pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang / bstan pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This is good conduct and being shown.

original: 'dir gzhung ni /🔽gnas ga gi mor 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni / gnas ga gi mor 'jug par bya ste /
translated: Here is the text:

original: de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan dan bcas pa so sor thar pa dang bcas shing dge slong tshul khrims dan ldan pa yon tan dan ldan pa des dge ba'i chos can dag 'khod kyi /
analyzed: de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan dan bcas pa so sor thar pa dang bcas shing dge slong tshul khrims dan ldan pa yon tan dan ldan pa des dge ba'i chos can dag 'khod kyi /
translated: One should enter a place where the elder has been appointed by the Saṅgha of monks, along with the Prātimokṣa, and where the monks are endowed with morality and endowed with good qualities. That is where virtuous dharmas are established.

original: de dag gi 'gyod pa ma skyes pa ni skyed par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de dag gi 'gyod pa ma skyes pa ni skyed par mi 'gyur la /
translated: For those who have not given rise to regret, it will not arise.

original: skyes pa ni skad cig ma nyid du slar sel bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes pa ni skad cig ma nyid du slar sel bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: For those who have given rise to it, it will be dispelled in an instant.

original: so sor thar pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gdon pa dang ldan pa nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: so sor thar pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gdon pa dang ldan pa nyid du bstan to //
translated: By saying along with the Prātimokṣa, it is shown that the elder of the Saṅgha is endowed with the recitation.

original: bsgo bar da las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bsgo bar da las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning is: You should not transgress my order.

original: brten pas brjod pa gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: brten pas brjod pa gang yin pa de nyid bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: You should accomplish just what I have ordered.

original: phyis 'ongs pa rnams kyi don du de gnyis yang byar rung ngo zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong dang dgag dbye 'di dag yang byed pa'o //
analyzed: phyis 'ongs pa rnams kyi don du de gnyis yang byar rung ngo zhes bya ba ni gso sbyong dang dgag dbye 'di dag yang byed pa'o //
translated: It is suitable to perform those two again for the sake of those who come later.  The meaning is: One should perform again these purification and the lifting of restrictions.

original: gal te legs par na de la ci dgar 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te gso sbyong dang dgag dbye de gnyis legs par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te legs par na de la ci dgar 'jug par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te gso sbyong dang dgag dbye de gnyis legs par byas pa yin no //
translated: If it is well done, one should enter into it as one wishes.  The meaning is: If these two, purification and the lifting of restrictions, are well done,

original: de'i tshe 'dod pa ni 'dod pa ste yang 'jug pa la'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'dod pa ni 'dod pa ste yang 'jug pa la'o //
translated: then one should enter into them as one wishes.

original: 'on te 'dir gcig pa nyid ma yin pa'i skyon nas gzhan yang rung ba yod bar gyur na 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te 'dir gcig pa nyid ma yin pa'i skyon nas gzhan yang rung ba yod bar gyur na 'dod pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But if there is a fault of non-uniqueness here, and another is suitable, then one should not wish for it,

original: 'on kyang gdon mi za bar yang 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang gdon mi za bar yang 'jug par bya'o //
translated: but one should certainly enter into it again.

original: 'du ba mthun pa dag @84b la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'du ba mthun pa dag @84b la yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Also in the case of a concordant assembly.

original: gnyug mar gnas pa rnams ni byas pa dang ldan pa'i gnyug mar gnas pa rnams dang 'du ba mthun pa yin la /
analyzed: gnyug mar gnas pa rnams ni byas pa dang ldan pa'i gnyug mar gnas pa rnams dang 'du ba mthun pa yin la /
translated: The resident monks are in agreement with the resident monks who have completed the proper procedures.

original: glo bur du lhags pa rnams kyang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams dang mthun pa yin snyam du rtogs par bya'o //🔽'on kyang 'du ba mthun pa yin pas /
analyzed: glo bur du lhags pa rnams kyang gnyug mar gnas pa rnams dang mthun pa yin snyam du rtogs par bya'o // 'on kyang 'du ba mthun pa yin pas /
translated: The newly arrived monks are in agreement with the resident monks.

original: gnyug mar gnas pa byas zin pa rnams glo bur du lhags pa dag la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽gzhan gyi tshogs pa gsol bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gnyug mar gnas pa byas zin pa rnams glo bur du lhags pa dag la yang zhes bya ba'i don to // gzhan gyi tshogs pa gsol bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: However, the resident monks who have completed the proper procedures are in agreement with the newly arrived monks.🔽This is the meaning of “the newly arrived monks are in agreement with the resident monks.”

original: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni gang dag gi 'dod pa 'di smos pa de dag las gzhan pa gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni gang dag gi 'dod pa 'di smos pa de dag las gzhan pa gsol bar bya'o //
translated: “The other group should be invited” means that the other group, other than the one that has been mentioned, should be invited.

original: de ma thob na mtshams gzhan du bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa de ma thob na mi mthun pa nyid kyi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ma thob na mtshams gzhan du bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa de ma thob na mi mthun pa nyid kyi nyes pa spang ba'i phyir /
translated: “If they are not available, the boundary should be changed” means that if the other group is not available, the boundary should be changed in order to avoid the problem of disagreement.

original: mtshams gzhan du las byed pa ni de dag nyi tshe ra ma zad kyi las thams cad la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshams gzhan du las byed pa ni de dag nyi tshe ra ma zad kyi las thams cad la yang de bzhin no //
translated: The procedure should be done in another boundary. This is not only for the poṣadha ceremony, but for all the other rites as well.

original: byed pa'i tshe 'ongs na lhag ma nyams su myong bas 'grub po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: byed pa'i tshe 'ongs na lhag ma nyams su myong bas 'grub po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If they come when the rite is being performed, the observance is accomplished by experiencing the remainder.

original: dgag dbye byed par 'gyur ba'i tshe gang dag 'ongs par gyur na de dag la rang gi dgag dbye bya ste gong ma ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dgag dbye byed par 'gyur ba'i tshe gang dag 'ongs par gyur na de dag la rang gi dgag dbye bya ste gong ma ni ma yin no //
translated: When the observance is being performed, if those who have come perform their own observance, not the previous one.

original: snga ma nyid nyams su myong bar ma gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ma grub pa ste 'on kyang grub pa kho na'o //
analyzed: snga ma nyid nyams su myong bar ma gyur pa nyid kyi phyir ma grub pa ste 'on kyang grub pa kho na'o //
translated: The previous one is not accomplished because it has not been experienced, but it is accomplished.

original: de bzhin du gso sbyong byed par gyur pa nyid kyi tshe gang dag 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams la der so sor thar pa las gang zhig lhag ma ma bton par gyur pa de'i 'phro nyams su myong bas kyang gso sbyong 'grub bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du gso sbyong byed par gyur pa nyid kyi tshe gang dag 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams la der so sor thar pa las gang zhig lhag ma ma bton par gyur pa de'i 'phro nyams su myong bas kyang gso sbyong 'grub bo //
translated: In the same way, when the observance is being performed, if those who have come experience the remainder of whatever Poṣadha observance has not been performed by them in the Individual Liberation, the observance is accomplished.

original: de bas na der slar byed pa don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na der slar byed pa don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi bya ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since it would be pointless to perform it again, it should not be performed.

original: der 'di la ma grub pa ji ltar thos pa nyan du bcug pa la yang yin zhe na /
analyzed: der 'di la ma grub pa ji ltar thos pa nyan du bcug pa la yang yin zhe na /
translated: Here, how is it that listening to what has not been accomplished is also listening to what has been heard?

original: gang gi phyir 'dir de lta bu lhag ma nyams su myong ba thams cad so sor gnas pa'i tshig yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir de lta bu lhag ma nyams su myong ba thams cad so sor gnas pa'i tshig yod pa yin te /
translated: Because here, all remaining experiences are words that remain individually.

original: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag las so sor thar pa'i mdo las bsten pa'i gleng gzhi yod de /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag las so sor thar pa'i mdo las bsten pa'i gleng gzhi yod de /
translated: Venerable ones, in the Sūtra on Individual Liberation, there is a basis for the discussion of reliance.

original: pham par gyur pa bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pham par gyur pa bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is called the teaching on the four defeats and so on.

original: gnas de nas 'ga' yang ma song ba yin na nges pa yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gnas de nas 'ga' yang ma song ba yin na nges pa yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If no one has left that place, it is definite.

original: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye zin pa'i gnas de nas gcig kyang ma song ba nyid yin na /
analyzed: gso sbyong dang dgag dbye zin pa'i gnas de nas gcig kyang ma song ba nyid yin na /
translated: If not a single person has left that very place where the purification and the lifting of restrictions have been completed,

original: tshogs pa ma byin pa'i phyir nges pa ste 'dod pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshogs pa ma byin pa'i phyir nges pa ste 'dod pas ni ma yin no //
translated: it is definite, not by desire, because the assembly has not been given.

original: mi rigs pa gnas pa tshogs pas rung ba nyid la yan lag gi ngo bo 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams kyis yan lag gi dngos pos 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'jug pa'i nges pa 'di rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: mi rigs pa gnas pa tshogs pas rung ba nyid la yan lag gi ngo bo 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams kyis yan lag gi dngos pos 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'jug pa'i nges pa 'di rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Those who are present in the assembly, who are suitable, and who have entered the essential parts, will not go by the essential parts. This is the determination of entry that is established here.

original: @85a * // 'dir 'dod pas 'jug pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: @85a * // 'dir 'dod pas 'jug pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should not enter because of desire.

original: glo bur du lhags pa ches mang ba nyid yin na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: glo bur du lhags pa ches mang ba nyid yin na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Even if there are many more who have arrived later,

original: gal te phyis 'ongs pa mang bar gyur na /🔽song ba la yang gso sbyong gi gnas nas 'ga' yang 'dir nges pas 'jug pa la ches mang ba nyid la rab tu 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te phyis 'ongs pa mang bar gyur na / song ba la yang gso sbyong gi gnas nas 'ga' yang 'dir nges pas 'jug pa la ches mang ba nyid la rab tu 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: if there are many more who have arrived later,🔽then one should follow the side of the monks who have been there longer, because they are the majority.

original: dus kyi phyir ni ches mang po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni gal te gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi tshes bco lnga yin la /🔽glo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi ni tshes bcu bzhi yin pa'am /
analyzed: dus kyi phyir ni ches mang po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni gal te gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyi tshes bco lnga yin la / glo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi ni tshes bcu bzhi yin pa'am /
translated: If the fifteenth is the poṣadha day for the resident monks,

original: bcu drug yin pa'am /
analyzed: bcu drug yin pa'am /
translated: but the fourteenth or the sixteenth is the poṣadha day for the newly arrived monks,🔽then one should follow the side of the resident monks, because they are the majority.

original: glo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi ni tshes bcu bzhi 'am bcu drug yin pa lta bu de la ni dge slong gang mang shos kyi phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
analyzed: glo bur du lhags pa rnams kyi ni tshes bcu bzhi 'am bcu drug yin pa lta bu de la ni dge slong gang mang shos kyi phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
translated: If the fourteenth or the sixteenth is the poṣadha day for the resident monks,🔽but the fifteenth is the poṣadha day for the newly arrived monks,🔽then one should follow the side of the newly arrived monks, because they are the majority.

original: ji ste phyogs gnyis ka grangs mnyam pa kho na yin na gcig pa yang dge slong de snyed pa nyid de gzhan la yang de snyed pa nyid do //
analyzed: ji ste phyogs gnyis ka grangs mnyam pa kho na yin na gcig pa yang dge slong de snyed pa nyid de gzhan la yang de snyed pa nyid do //
translated: If the two sides are exactly equal, then the number of monks is the same as the number of the other, and the number of the other is the same as the number of the monks.

original: gnyug mar gnas pa'i phyogs su glo bur du 'ongs pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gnyug mar gnas pa'i phyogs su glo bur du 'ongs pa'i phyogs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: The resident monks should follow the side of the newly arrived monks.

original: ji skad du gsungs pa mnyam pa nyid yin na gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa mnyam pa nyid yin na gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyang ngo zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If the number of monks is equal to the number of the other, then the resident monks should follow the side of the other.

original: der rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid du rung ba yin te /
analyzed: der rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid du rung ba yin te /
translated: It is proper to follow the side of the newly arrived monks.🔽It is also proper to do it for the sake of the newly arrived monks.

original: phyis 'ongs pa rnams kyi don du zhes bya ba yang byed pa rung ba nyid brjod pa yin te /🔽'jug pa la ni 'dir 'dod pa thob pa de 'dir dus kyi skabs su dmigs kyis bsal ba de bstan pa'i phyir 'di la yang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: phyis 'ongs pa rnams kyi don du zhes bya ba yang byed pa rung ba nyid brjod pa yin te / 'jug pa la ni 'dir 'dod pa thob pa de 'dir dus kyi skabs su dmigs kyis bsal ba de bstan pa'i phyir 'di la yang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The word “also” indicates that the exception is stated for the sake of the resident monks.

original: 'dir yang rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid la nges pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang rjes su 'jug par bya ba nyid la nges pa ste /
translated: Here, the resident monks should also follow the side of the newly arrived monks.

original: 'dir 'jug pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dir 'jug pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, the meaning of “follow the side of the newly arrived monks” is stated.

original: gso sbyong gi cho ga'i skabs so //
analyzed: gso sbyong gi cho ga'i skabs so //
translated: This is the context of the ceremony for the poṣadha purification.

original: ting nge 'dzin las bslang bar mi bya'o zhes bya bar 'dir rnam par 'byed pa dang mdo phyi ma'i yang gzhung ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las bslang bar mi bya'o zhes bya bar 'dir rnam par 'byed pa dang mdo phyi ma'i yang gzhung ngo //
